question: I am down with flu. any du'aas
answer:
QUESTION

I am down with flu. any du'aas

ANSWER


Share:

Get rose water and put pure Saffron in it to make ink. Get a thin stick and use as a pensil and write the following on 40 white plates in Arabic. It could be written one a day: bismilillaahir rahmaanir raheem. Alhamdulillahi rabbil aalameen, wa sallallaahu alan nabiyyil kareem. Yaa hayyu heena laa yabqaa fiy daymoomatihi wa baqaa-ihi, yaa hayyu. Wa sallallaahu alan nabiyyil kareem’.

Let the ink dry and wash it first thing in the morning and collect the water and drink it. Repeat for 40 days.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
